name: The Soul Escape
description:
This is a dark fantasy styled infinite runner. The goal is to last as long as possible to get the highest score you can. Collect gems within gameplay to unlock skins for the main ghost character. 

This project was completed in a few months as a university project. 

All of the programming was done by me. 

I also helped with things such as shaders and particle effects within the game. 

PROGRAMMER:

- Jake Norris

ARTISTS:

2D - Briar Brunner, Ethan Sharlot

3D - Eryk Kowal
